title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Skills: Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning Project for Language Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively author topic-specific language content in 3-person team projects using a wiki platform.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' content and collaboratively revise it using wiki editing features.
Learners can incorporate peer evaluation feedback at least three times during project progression via wiki-based formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
